name: Bamboo-zled
description:
Made for the GMTK game jam 2018

Oh no! Penilly has lost her amazing bowtie! It has been stolen by the evil panther twins. Now Penilly must swing her way through the dangerous bamboo forest to retrieve her precious bowtie, She just doesn' t look good without it.

Mash your way through this bullet hell without bullets! This platformer without platforms! Stay in balance as you fight with both Ying and Yang to keep your fur perfectly contrasting!

Note:

Windows only

Only tested at 1920x1080 resolution.
